Class for single time series

Source: R/perSingle.R
persephoneSingle.Rd

Class for single time series

Class for single time series

Details

A common class for the wrapper classes x13Single and tramoseatsSingle

Super class

persephone::persephone -> persephoneSingle

Methods

Public methods

  • persephoneSingle$new()

  • persephoneSingle$run()

  • persephoneSingle$clone()

Inherited methods

  • persephone::persephone$fixModel()

  • persephone::persephone$fixOutlier()

  • persephone::persephone$generateQrTable()

  • persephone::persephone$iterate()

  • persephone::persephone$plot()

  • persephone::persephone$plotResiduals()

  • persephone::persephone$plotSeasIrrCal()

  • persephone::persephone$print()

  • persephone::persephone$setOptions()

  • persephone::persephone$updateParams()

Method new()

create a new single object

Usage

persephoneSingle$new(ts, template = "RSA0", userdefined = NULL, ...)

Arguments

ts

a time series object

template

passed as the spec argument of x13() or tramoseats()

userdefined

passed as the userdefined argument of x13() or tramoseats()

...

passed to x13_spec() or tramoseats_spec()

Method run()

run the model

Usage

persephoneSingle$run(verbose = FALSE)

Arguments

verbose

wether to display outputs after the run

Method clone()

The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

Usage

persephoneSingle$clone(deep = FALSE)

Arguments

deep

Whether to make a deep clone.
